definitions: not in accordance with truth or fact; incorrectly

examples.text: the police falsely accused him of murder
the deaths were falsely attributed to influenza

shortDefinitions: not in accordance with truth or fact

definitions: not in accordance with rules or law; dishonestly

examples.text: he admitted two counts of falsely claiming expenses
he was offered money to testify falsely against me

shortDefinitions: not in accordance with rules or law

definitions: in an insincere or artificial manner
in an illusory manner; not actually so

examples.text: testing will yield falsely reassuring results
